definition: worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
a good wife and loving mother

sentences.english: There's a natural feel happy, if encounter, overbearing, also do not have a scenery.
sentences.chinese: 家有賢妻，自然其樂融融，若遇悍，也別有一番風景。

sentences.english: The best wealth of man have a considerate wife.
sentences.chinese: 男人最好的財富是有一位通情達理的賢妻。

sentences.english: He is blessed in having such a good wife.
sentences.chinese: 他有幸娶到如此一位賢妻。

sentences.english: All you need for happiness is a good gun, a good horse, and a good wife.
sentences.chinese: 幸福只需一杆好槍，一匹良駒和一位賢妻。

sentences.english: A good wife that never grumbles.
sentences.chinese: 良馬不失蹄，賢妻不聒絮。

sentences.english: The days of the dutiful wife, who sacrifices her career for her husband, are over.
sentences.chinese: 賢妻爲了丈夫而犧牲自己事業的時代已經結束了。

sentences.english: She is more mother than wife.
sentences.chinese: 她是個良母，但算不上賢妻。

sentences.english: A good wife and health is a man best wealth.
sentences.chinese: 賢妻和健康是男人的至寶。

sentences.english: A good wife and health are a man's best wealth.
sentences.chinese: 賢妻與健康是丈夫最佳財富。

sentences.english: A good wife and health, is a man's best wealth.
sentences.chinese: 賢妻和健康是男人最好的財富。

sentences.english: No road is long with your wife.
sentences.chinese: 與賢妻爲伴路遙不覺遠。

sentences.english: She unites the best qualities of a good wife and a tender mother.
sentences.chinese: 她同時具有賢妻和良母的最佳品德。

sentences.english: Mills and wives are ever wanting.
A good wife and health is a man's best wealth.
sentences.chinese: 賢妻和健康是男子的至寶。

definition: a good wife and loving mother
handsome high-powered businessman (a type of character in an eponymous genre of romantic fiction who typically has a soft spot for a girl of lower social status)
half the sky/women of the new society/womenfolk
the return of a prodigal son (idiom)
to endure humiliation as part of an important mission (idiom); to suffer in silence
to be loyal (to one's friends)/to value loyalty
to bear patiently/to endure silently/to forbear
